app_of_the_day.name: Anki
app_of_the_day.what: Flashcard app with a proven spaced repetition algorithm — shows you cards right before you'd forget them, maximizing memory retention with minimum review time.
app_of_the_day.why: The most evidence-backed way to memorize anything long-term. Used by med students, language learners, and anyone who needs to retain large amounts of information.
app_of_the_day.verdict: Make a deck for stats formulas and review 10 minutes per day. You'll have them memorized for the final with zero cramming.

exercises.name: Pike Push-ups
exercises.note: Shoulder press alternative, no equipment needed

exercises.name: Tricep Dips (chair)
exercises.note: Use any sturdy chair, elbows close to body

exercises.name: Superman Hold
exercises.note: Lie face down, lift arms and legs — lower back and rear delts

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.note: Core straight, don't let hips sag

health_tip: Drink a full glass of water before your first coffee. Rehydrates and cuts false hunger signals.

life_hack.tip: Write tomorrow's single most important task before you close your laptop. Eliminates morning decision fatigue completely.

money_tip.tip: Track every purchase for 30 days before trying to optimize anything. You can't cut what you haven't measured.
